TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit PeerCollaboration extends System.Object
public ref class PeerCollaboration abstract sealed

summary.span: 與對等共同作業基礎結構互動。

span.span: Interacts with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.

summary.span: 許多核心共同作業的案例都是從這個類別開始的。

span.span: Many of the core collaboration scenarios begin with this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別是靜態類別，它是密封的抽象，而且沒有公用建構函式。This class is a static class – it is sealed, abstract and does not have a public constructor. 它用來包含及管理應用程式、 物件和已接受邀請共同作業工作階段的對等電腦顯示狀態資訊。It is used to contain and manage application, object, and presence information for peers that have accepted invitations to a collaboration session. 對等、 物件和應用程式，根據 PeerCollaboration 類別會提供三個存取子，一個用於每個集合，做為介面或其他任何發生在電腦上的連線點。In terms of peers, objects, and applications, the PeerCollaboration class provides three accessors, one for each collection, as an interface or point of connectivity for whatever else is happening on the machine. 這個類別無法被繼承。如果這個密封的類別會指定為基底類別，會發生編譯時期錯誤。This class cannot be inherited; a compile-time error will occur if this sealed class is specified as the base class. 這個類別中方法和屬性可以用來：Methods and properties in this class can be used to: - 啟動及管理共同作業應用程式Launch and manage collaborative applications - 註冊及刪除應用程式和共同作業物件 （例如憑證、 圖片、 虛擬人偶，以及文字描述）Register and delete applications and collaboration objects (such as certificates, pictures, avatars, and text descriptions) - 邀請同儕節點加入共同作業工作階段，包括領域和用來識別它們在網際網路上的物件等項目Invite peers to collaboration sessions, including items such as scope and objects which will identify them over the Internet - 允許對等和的共同作業基礎結構管理的連絡人清單，或彼此發行其狀態Allow peers to and of the collaboration infrastructure, manage lists of contacts, or publish their presence to each other - 利用屬性和事件，以協調非同步應用程式的通訊，特別是針對變更名稱、 目前狀態、 應用程式或其他物件。Utilize properties and events to coordinate asynchronous application communication, especially for changes in name, presence, application, or other objects. 「 連結-本機雲端 」、 「 呼叫的子網路對等互連 」，「 NearMe 範圍 」 等同義詞彙。"Link-local cloud", "subnet of the calling peer", and "NearMe scope" are synonymous terms. 「 網際網路範圍 」 和 「 無伺服器的目前狀態 」 的意義相同。"Internet scope" and "serverless presence" are synonymous. 網站-本機有沒有對等共同作業的命名空間中。The site-local has no equivalent in the collaboration namespace. 使用每個方法或屬性，這個類別中的需要的。The use of every method or property in this class requires a of . 對等共同作業工作階段開始時，會建立此狀態。This state is created when the peer collaboration session begins.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ApplicationLaunchInfo As PeerApplicationLaunchInfo

summary.span: 取得 物件，內含因遠端對等電腦的共同作業要求而啟動應用程式時所需的資訊。

span.span: Gets the object that contains information needed when an application is started due to a collaboration request from a remote peer.

value.span: 如果應用程式因邀請而啟動，就會傳回 物件，內含傳送該應用程式邀請的對等電腦相關資訊和邀請本身，否則傳回 。

span.span: If the application was started due to an invitation, a object that contains both information about the peer that sent the application invitation and the invitation itself is returned; otherwise, is returned.
The default value for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是可供共同作業感知來判斷是否已啟動因遠端對等的共同作業要求而啟動後，執行個體。This property is to be used by a collaboration-aware instance after it is started to determine whether it was started due to a collaboration request from a remote peer. 呼叫的應用程式應該檢查和屬性，以取得進一步的邀請要求的相關資訊。The calling application should inspect the and properties to get further information about the invitation request. 存取這個屬性需要的。Access to this property requires a of . 此狀態時，會建立共同作業工作階段開始。This state is created when the collaboration session begins.

summary.span: 取消註冊與呼叫對等相關聯的 。

span.span: Unregisters a associated with the calling peer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對等物件會自動取消註冊 （移除） 從對等共同作業基礎結構時物件的參考已不再有效。Peer objects are automatically unregistered (removed) from the Peer Collaboration infrastructure when a reference to the object is no longer valid. 如果呼叫端不會維護物件的參考，它是從對等共同作業基礎結構取消註冊。If a caller does not maintain a reference to the object, it is unregistered from the Peer Collaboration infrastructure. 或者，您可以手動使用此方法註冊物件。Alternatively, an object can be manually unregistered by using this method. 呼叫這個方法需要的。Calling this method requires a of . 此狀態時，會建立共同作業工作階段開始。This state is created when the collaboration session begins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 顯示名稱不是一定是唯一的。Display names are not necessarily unique. 使用者應該驗證身分識別的人員使用的顯示名稱，透過電子郵件、 電話，或親自轉交之前接受共同作業邀請。Users should verify the identity of the person using the display name by email, phone, or in person before accepting a collaboration invitation. 此函式會將使用者登入共同作業基礎結構。This function signs the users into the Collaboration Infrastructure. 存取此方法需要的。Access to this method requires a of . 此狀態時，會建立共同作業工作階段開始。This state is created when the collaboration session begins. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何將使用者登入共同作業基礎結構。The following code example illustrates how to sign the users into the Collaboration infrastructure. [!code-csharp[NCLPNRPContacts#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLPNRPContacts/CS/NCLPNRPContacts.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對等主應用程式或主應用程式可能會限制或區分共同作業活動的對等電腦參與藉由使用不同的範圍。The peer host or host application may limit or differentiate peer participation in collaboration activities by using separate scopes. 呼叫的對等應該檢查以判斷哪些進一步的動作，它可以成功執行此方法的傳回值。The calling peer should inspect the return value from this method to determine what further actions it can successfully perform.

summary.span: 將對等登出指定的範圍。

span.span: Signs the peer out of the specified scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不是特定應用程式的作業，並登出，可能會影響其他可能在目前執行的應用程式。This method is not an application-specific operation and signing out may affect other applications that may be currently running. 如果使用者尚未登入指定的範圍內呼叫這個方法不會執行任何作業。If the user is not already signed into the specified scope calling this method results in a no-op. 當使用者登出近端分享時，其已發行的資訊都會從刪除端點物件集。When a user signs out of People Near Me, their published information is deleted from the endpoint object set. 這包括和，除了任何找出註冊所呼叫的對等共同作業基礎結構的物件。This includes and , in addition to any identifying objects registered by the calling peer into the collaboration infrastructure. 因為這項資訊已刪除，所以它不再提供給遠端對等或共同作業的對等主應用程式。Because this information is deleted, it is no longer available to either remote peers or a peer host for collaboration. 從的角度類別，其他共用相同的受信任的連絡人資訊無關; 使用類別不會影響其他物件中的這項資訊已保存，例如遠端對等物件。From the perspective of the class, other sharing of the same information with trusted contacts is not relevant; use of the class does not affect other objects in which this information was persisted, such as a remote peer object. 同樣地，刪除從對等並不會影響的共同作業應用程式，其已存在於其他連絡人是仍然可以檢視其目前狀態，並與其共同作業。Likewise, deleting a peer from the does not affect its presence in a collaboration application; other contacts are still able to view its presence and collaborate with it. 呼叫這個方法需要的。Calling this method requires a of . 此狀態時，會建立共同作業工作階段開始。This state is created when the collaboration session begins.

exception.span: 參數包含無效的列舉值。

span.span: The parameter contains an invalid enumeration value.

exception.span: 作業無法完成。

span.span: The operation could not be completed.

span.span: An object with implemented on it, to be used for application thread synchronization.
The default value for this property is .

MemberSignature.Value: public static void UnregisterApplication (System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication application, System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType type);

.method public static hidebysig void UnregisterApplication(class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication application, valuetype System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType type) cil managed
Public Shared Sub UnregisterApplication (application As PeerApplication, type As PeerApplicationRegistrationType)

param.name: application
param.span: 要針對呼叫對等取消註冊的 。

span.span: The to unregister for the calling peer.

param.name: type
param.span: 為存在電腦的呼叫對等或所有對等執行的取消註冊類型。

span.span: The type of deregistration to perform for either the calling peer or for all peers that exist on the machine.

summary.span: 從 基礎結構取消註冊指定的 。

span.span: Unregisters the specified from the infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正在取消註冊停止接收它的共同作業邀請的呼叫對等。Unregistering a stops the calling peer from receiving collaboration invitations for it. 如果要取消登錄的應用程式尚未註冊，這不是執行任何作業。If the application being unregistered was not previously registered, this is a no-op. 呼叫這個方法需要的。Calling this method requires a of . 此狀態時，會建立共同作業工作階段開始。This state is created when the collaboration session begins.

span.span: The globally unique for the specified application does not exist or is empty.
